opinion:
537 U.S. 807

MOSELEY ET AL., DBA VICTOR'S LITTLE SECRET
v.
V SECRET CATALOGUE, INC., ET AL.

No. 01-1015.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 7, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE SIXTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 6th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 535 U.S. 985.] Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
